ygData.subject: Resistance and Rhythym songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t recall seeing a resistance message ever for a partially resistable spell like Direct Damage (DD) ones.  However, when the caster hits me and my health
ygData.messageBody:
I don't recall seeing a resistance message ever for a partially resistable
spell like Direct Damage (DD) ones. However, when the caster hits me and my
health bar doesn't move from a spell that can do up to 40 points, I know I
took at most 3 or 4, I don't have that many hp's so the bar movement is
still pretty visible. Also I resisted 4 straight roots, bummer if I'm gonna
fail that would have been my choice, and 7 straight walking sleeps. All in
all I seldom take any measurable damage from spells, but then again my MR is
jacked up pretty high for my level. Since it is unlikely to improve much at
this point, barring increased song effects, I will undoubtedly have more
trouble at higher levels. 113 vs a hag probably isnt anywhere near as good
as having 70 somethin against lvl 15-17 casters.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [mailto:kblair@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 12:34 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] fighting twinking


From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>

> and cold resist, not magic resist? I was using Elemental and
> Guardian Rhythms last night with a battle drum fighting hags
> in Unrest (113 MR, 74 FR and CR, a little more or less for
> others). I didn't see a single resist message. Do you even
> get a resist message if you resist a DD? When I did the same

As far as I've experienced the Rhythm songs have been completely useless.
Just my experience though..
